program_design.title: Habit Formation
program_design.description: Built on proven behavioral science principles from Charles Duhigg's The Power of Habit and James Clear's Atomic Habits.

program_design.title: Incremental Progress
program_design.description: Small, sustainable changes that compound over time, focusing on consistency rather than perfection.

program_design.title: Community Support
program_design.description: Built-in accountability and support systems to help you stay motivated and on track with your goals.

program_design.title: Evidence-Based
program_design.description: All recommendations and strategies are grounded in scientific research and proven methodologies.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 1
program_structure.description: Foundation building and mindset development. Learn the core principles that will guide your health transformation journey.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 2
program_structure.description: Nutrition fundamentals and meal planning strategies. Discover how to fuel your body for optimal performance.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 3
program_structure.description: Strength training basics and form mastery. Build a solid foundation of movement patterns and strength.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 4
program_structure.description: Cardiovascular conditioning and endurance building. Improve your stamina and overall fitness levels.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 5
program_structure.description: Recovery and mobility enhancement. Learn techniques to prevent injury and improve flexibility.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 6
program_structure.description: Advanced training techniques and progression strategies. Take your fitness to the next level.

program_structure.title: Training Evolution 7
program_structure.description: Peak performance and goal achievement. Master the skills needed to reach your ultimate health goals.

program_structure.title: The Final 5
program_structure.description: The ultimate challenge that brings together everything you've learned. This is where transformation happens.

program_faq.title: Is this a diet program?
program_faq.description: No, Commit 250 is not a diet program. We provide education and resources to help you make informed decisions about nutrition, but we don't prescribe specific meal plans.

program_faq.title: Do I need to work out every day?
program_faq.description: The program is designed to be flexible. We provide suggested training options, but you can adapt them to your schedule and fitness level.

program_faq.title: How long does the program take?
program_faq.description: The program is designed for 250 days, but you can progress at your own pace. The key is consistency, not speed.

program_faq.title: What if I miss a day?
program_faq.description: Life happens! The program is designed to be forgiving. Simply pick up where you left off and continue your journey.

program_faq.title: Is there community support?
program_faq.description: Yes! We have a supportive community of like-minded individuals who are also on their health transformation journey.
